Tasks.Task Description: Identify the analytics requirements, data sources, and expected outcomes. Define the scope of the Azure Data Factory project and set clear objectives.

Tasks.Task: Assess Data Sources and Integration Needs
Tasks.Task Description: Evaluate the data sources to be integrated, including on-premises databases, cloud storage, and third-party APIs. Determine the data transformation and movement requirements.
Create a detailed design for the data pipelines, including data ingestion, transformation, and loading processes. Ensure scalability and fault tolerance in the design.

Tasks.Task: Set Up Azure Data Factory Instance
Tasks.Task Description: Provision a new Azure Data Factory instance in the Azure portal. Configure the instance with the required settings and permissions.
Set up linked services to connect Azure Data Factory to data sources and destinations, such as Azure Blob Storage, SQL databases, or external APIs.
Create and configure data pipelines to perform data ingestion, transformation, and loading tasks. Use activities such as Copy Data, Data Flow, and custom scripts.
Apply security best practices, such as role-based access control (RBAC), managed identities, and encryption for data at rest and in transit.
Perform end-to-end testing of data pipelines to ensure data is correctly ingested, transformed, and loaded. Validate data accuracy and pipeline performance.
Configure monitoring and alerting for pipeline runs using Azure Monitor and Data Factory metrics. Set up alerts for failures and performance issues.
Analyze pipeline performance and optimize activities, data flows, and resource utilization to improve efficiency and reduce costs.
Create detailed documentation for pipeline configurations, data sources, transformations, and operational procedures. Share documentation with relevant stakeholders.
Provide training sessions for the operations team on managing, monitoring, and troubleshooting Azure Data Factory pipelines.
Ensure the Azure Data Factory setup complies with organizational and regulatory requirements. Implement auditing mechanisms to track data movement and transformations.
